title: Game Progress Route
content:
d speak up. Respond:

Signal Lae'zel silently: 'Truth'. [Persuasion] Signal Lae'zel silently: Play Along. Present the unusual artefact. Are you seeking this, I presume? I have my own agenda. Prepare to face defeat, gith.

Select option 2. With enough Charisma, Lae'zel plays along, gaining Voss's approval. (Shadowheart and Lae'zel approve.) Voss leaves, conversation with Lae'zel follows. She's relieved at your adept intervention with Kith'rak. She feared artefact possession exposure meant danger.
